   contain the root `toctree` directive.

StatSEG Documentation
=====================

StatSEG is a small python utility and library for masking low-complexity
regions of amino/nucleic acid sequences.

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 1
    :caption: Contents:

    install
    cli
    api
